TopicTitle: How to unlock one particular item in a tech tree?

Articles.Content: I'm playing with SETI and for some reason it places the fuel line to the very end of the tech tree. Is there a way I can unlock it using a module manager config or something of the sort?

If SETI is using ModuleManager to move the fuel line then it will have something like the following somewhere in its config (the particular tech node it's using will be something other than fuelSystems, but since I don't use SETI I don't know exactly where it puts it): 

@PART[fuelLine]:FINAL
{
	@TechRequired = fuelSystems
}

You can change the particular node that's required here. You could also add your own config to change it, but whether it works would depend on whether ModuleManager runs your patch before or after SETI.
Perfect, got it, thanks!
